titleStmt.title: The fanatick indulgence granted anno 1679. By Mr. Ninian Paterson.
titleStmt.author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by David Lindsay and his partners, at the foot of Heriot's-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Latin dedication to James II (as future king) on verso of title page and at end of text.
An appeal to the future king to renounce "indulgence" for Protestant dissenters, especially the Covenanters, followed by an enthusiastic welcome to Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
